title: ğŸ” AWS IoT Jobs Explorer (Boto3)
learning_description:
This script helps you explore and understand AWS IoT Jobs in detail. You'll learn how
to inspect job configurations, monitor job executions across devices, and understand
job status reporting. This is essential for managing OTA deployments and troubleshooting
device update issues in production IoT environments.

learning.job_status_tip: ğŸ’¡ Learning Tip: Job statuses indicate the overall progress of your OTA deployment.
learning.in_progress_tip: IN_PROGRESS jobs are actively deploying to devices.
learning.job_document_tip: ğŸ’¡ Learning Tip: The job document contains the instructions sent to devices.
learning.presigned_url_tip: Presigned URLs allow secure S3 access without device credentials.
learning.execution_status_tip: ğŸ’¡ Learning Tip: Job executions track individual device progress.
learning.status_details_tip: Status details contain device-reported information about success/failure.
learning.execution_progress_tip: ğŸ’¡ Learning Tip: Job execution status shows how your OTA deployment is progressing.
learning.succeeded_tip: SUCCEEDED means the device successfully completed the update.
learning.api_access_note: ğŸ’¡ Note: This script can now access job execution details for jobs in any status (including COMPLETED, FAILED, etc.)
